name: 7th Residential Energy Storage Forum
content: The 7th Residential Energy Storage Forum will be held on 22 June – 25 June 2020 in the heart of Sydney, Australia. Join us to gain insights from 10 utilities/DSOs experience with residential energy storage applications Features of the event include: • 40+ global speakers, over 30 in-depth topics, 3 panel discussions and 2 masterclasses, which will provide unique learning and problem-solving opportunities with fellow industry professionals • Hear from Commercial & Industrial companies about battery technology, business models and more! • Partake in a highly selective networking session and gain a wider perspective from experts on residential energy storage • Listen to market operators, regulators, and investors address the key researched issues of residential energy storage in Australia and around the world!
